en-US.summary: Ask Alexa for the safe cooking temperature for different foods.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask Cooking Temperature for beef
Alexa ask Cooking Temperature about chicken
en-US.name: Cooking Temperature
en-US.description: Using information from the USDA website, find out the safe cooking temperature for different foods. Source: https://www.fsis.usda.gov/wps/portal/fsis/topics/food-safety-education/get-answers/food-safety-fact-sheets/safe-food-handling/safe-minimum-internal-temperature-chart/ct_index
